title: Breaking Up With Java: Is the Cost and Complexity Worth It?
author: Simon Ritter
description: Removing Java can be a complex process, given the pervasive nature of the programming language and toolkit across your applications and infrastructure.
cntitle: 与 Java 分手：成本和复杂性值得吗？
cndescription: 移除 Java 可能是一个复杂的过程，因为编程语言和工具包在您的应用程序和基础架构中无处不在。
